20101229013534.000|20101229013535.000|CC1|TECHNOLOGY.                     
20101229013535.000|20101229013537.000|CC1|COMPUTER PROGRAMMED MACHINES    
20101229013537.000|20101229013539.000|CC1|LIKE THESE COST UP TO $800,000  
20101229013539.000|20101229013541.000|CC1|AND CAN CLEAN A TWO-MILE LONG   
20101229013541.000|20101229013548.000|CC1|RUNWAY IN FOUR MINUTES.         
20101229013548.000|20101229013553.000|CC1|>> AIRPORTS LIKE TO TRAVEL DOWN 
20101229013553.000|20101229013553.000|CC1|AT ANYWHERE FROM 25 TO 45 MILES 
20101229013553.000|20101229013554.000|CC1|PER HOUR WITH THESE VEHICLES.   
20101229013554.000|20101229013555.000|CC1|IT'S A VERY EFFICIENT WAY TO    
20101229013555.000|20101229013556.000|CC1|CLEAN THE SNOW FROM THE RUNWAY. 
20101229013556.000|20101229013556.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IF THAT'S TRUE, WHY
20101229013556.000|20101229013557.000|CC1|DID SO MANY PEOPLE END UP       
20101229013557.000|20101229013558.000|CC1|SLEEPING IN AIRPORTS LAST

20101229013601.000|20101229013602.000|CC1|SO MUCH AS THE WIND HOWLING FOR 
20101229013602.000|20101229013606.000|CC1|HOURS AT UP TO 60 MILES PER     
20101229013606.000|20101229013606.000|CC1|HOUR-- THAT MADE THIS BLIZZARD  
20101229013606.000|20101229013611.000|CC1|SO POWERFUL.                    
20101229013611.000|20101229013611.000|CC1|>> I THINK THE WINDS REALLY     
20101229013611.000|20101229013612.000|CC1|INCREASED THE IMPACT THAT WE    
20101229013612.000|20101229013613.000|CC1|FELT DUE TO THE FACT THAT IT    
20101229013613.000|20101229013613.000|CC1|CREATED A LOT OF BLOWING AND    
20101229013613.000|20101229013616.000|CC1|DRIFTING OF SNOW.               
20101229013616.000|20101229013616.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IN WHITE-OUT       
20101229013616.000|20101229013617.000|CC1|CONDITIONS, SNOW REMOVAL CREWS  
20101229013617.000|20101229013619.000|CC1|CAN'T OPERATE.

20101229013620.000|20101229013622.000|CC1|RUNWAY THE WAY YOU SHOVEL YOUR  
20101229013622.000|20101229013624.000|CC1|WALK.

20101229013626.000|20101229013629.000|CC1|MEASURE RUNWAY FRICTION.        
20101229013629.000|20101229013631.000|CC1|THE AVIATION WAR WITH WINTER IS 
20101229013631.000|20101229013633.000|CC1|BECOMING INCREASINGLY

20101229013638.000|20101229013641.000|CC1|MATERIALS.

20101229013641.000|20101229013642.000|CC1|CHEAPER, MORE POWERFUL MACHINES

20101229013645.000|20101229013645.000|CC1|TONS OF SNOW IN A MATTER OF

20101229013649.000|20101229013657.000|CC1|REMOVAL EQUIPMENT IN AIRPORTS

20101229013726.000|20101229013727.000|CC1|75% OF THE COUNTRY'S ORANGE CROP
20101229013727.000|20101229013728.000|CC1|AND 40% OF THE WORLD'S ORANGE
